title: Trekking sarl
text:
Trekking sarl is a French <a href="aircraft%20manufacturer">aircraft manufacturer</a> based in <a href="Lambesc">Lambesc</a>. The company specializes in the design and manufacture of <a href="paraglider">paraglider</a>s and <a href="paramotor">paramotor</a> wings in the form of ready-to-fly aircraft. The company also produces <a href="four-wheel%20drive">four-wheel drive</a> truck <a href="tent">tent</a>s and travel <a href="luggage">luggage</a>, as well as photo and video accessories.
The company was founded in 1976 by Axel de Neufville in <a href="Marseilles">Marseilles</a>. It is organized as a <a href="soci%C3%A9t%C3%A9%20%C3%A0%20responsabilit%C3%A9%20limit%C3%A9e">société à responsabilité limitée</a> (sarl), a French <a href="private%20limited%20company">private limited company</a>.
Divisions.
Trekking Parapentes is the division that constructs paragliders and paramotoring wings and is based in <a href="Saint-Mathieu-de-Tr%C3%A9viers">Saint-Mathieu-de-Tréviers</a>, although it was originally in Lambesc.
The division that makes travel luggage, money belts and accessories is based in Lambesc.
The division that makes truck-top tents for four-wheel drive trucks is based in <a href="Saint-Cannat">Saint-Cannat</a>.
